00052  public static function DissectVCards($content) {
00053   // prepare
00054   $r = array();
00055   $entry = array();
00056   
00057   // split lines
00058   $lines = explode("\n", $content);
00059   
00060   // process the lines
00061   foreach($lines as $line) {
00062    // this is important, because ':' is special it has to be recognised
00063    $line = trim($line);
00064    if(strlen($line) == 0) continue;
00065    $line = str_replace('\:', '@@@', $line);
00066    
00067    if($line == 'BEGIN:VCARD') {
00068     $entity = array();
00069    } else if($line == 'END:VCARD') {
00070     $r[] = $entity;
00071    } else {
00072     $parts = explode(':', $line);
00073     $k = explode(';', $parts[0]);
00074     $entity[strtoupper($k[0])][]['value'] = str_replace('@@@', ':', $parts[1]);
00075     for($i = 1; $i < count($k); ++$i) {
00076      $attr = explode('=', $k[$i]);
00077      $entity[strtoupper($k[0])][count($entity[$k[0]]) - 1]['attr'][][$attr[0]] = $attr[1];
00078     }
00079    }
00080   }
00081   
00082   return $r;
00083  }
00084  
00090  public static function CreateVCard($values) {
00091   $r = "BEGIN:VCARD\n";
00092   foreach($values as $k => $v) {
00093    $r .= strtoupper(trim(str_replace(':', '\:', $k)));
00094    if(is_array($v['attr']))
00095     $r .= ';' . implode(';', $v['attr']);
00096    $r .= ":" . str_replace(':', '\:', $v['value']) . "\n";
00097   }
00098   return $r . "END:VCARD\n";
00099  }
